info.description: REST API for managing football teams, players, and matches
info.title: Football Management API

post.description: Create a new match schedule between two teams

get.description: Get a match by its ID including goals

put.description: Update a match schedule by ID (only scheduled matches can be updated)

delete.description: Soft delete a match and its goals by ID

get.description: Get detailed match report including top scorer and team win statistics

post.description: Submit final score and goals for a match
Create a new player and assign to a team

get.description: Get a player by their ID

delete.description: Soft delete a player by ID

get.description: Get list of all football teams
Get a football team by its ID

put.description: Update a football team by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a football team by ID

get.description: Get all players belonging to a specific team

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and the JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
